site_name: Daynes Ridge Kennel L L C

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:00 pm on June 25,
2025. The inspector arrived at the facility and talked to an employee who said the licensee was not present. The
employee and the inspector both called the licensee and left a message. After 30 minutes the licensee had not arrived or
returned our calls, so the inspector left a note for the licensee with the employee and left the facility. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:00 pm on June 25, 
2025. The inspector arrived at the facility and talked to an employee who said the licensee was not present. The 
employee and the inspector both called the licensee and left a message. After 30 minutes the licensee had not arrived or 
returned our calls, so the inspector left a note for the licensee with the employee and left the facility. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
